data.name: CancelTransfer
data.comment: Progress indicator message when canceling a transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CleanRubbishBin
data.comment: Progress indicator message when emptying the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreditCardStore
data.comment: Progress indicator message when storing a credit card - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when deleting a node (folder or file) indicating the name - (String as short as possible). Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include node name.

data.name: DownloadLink
data.comment: Progress indicator message when retieving a download link - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FastLogin
data.value: Đang khôi phục phiên lần trước...
data.comment: Progress indicator message when resuming a session - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FetchingNodes
data.value: Đang lấy tệp tin và thư mục... [{0}]
data.comment: Progress indicator message when loading nodes from MEGA web service - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include current number of fetched nodes.

data.value: Đang lấy thông tin tài khoản...

data.name: LoadNodes
data.comment: Progress indicator message when building a nodes view - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when moving a node to a different parent - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NodeToTrash
data.comment: Progress indicator message when moving a node to the rubbish bin (trash) - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Progress indicator message when canceling a subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_OpenFolderLink
data.value: Đang mở đường liên kết thư mục...
data.comment: Progress indicator message when opening a folder link to import/download - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_CopyNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when copying a node to a different parent - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ImportFolder
data.comment: Progress indicator message when importing a folder - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ValidatePurchase
data.comment: Progress indicator message when validating purchase receipt - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ApiLocked
data.value: This process is taking longer than expected. Please wait.
data.comment: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to an API lock (API error -3) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ApiRateLimit
data.comment: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to a rate limit (API error -4) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ConnectivityIssue
data.value: Unable to reach MEGA. Please check your connectivity or try again later.
data.comment: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to connectivity issue - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PM_ServersBusy
data.value: Bộ phận máy chủ hiện đang bận. Xin vui lòng chờ.
data.comment: Progress indicator message when servers are too busy. SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to a HTTP error 500 - (String as short as possible).
